mapper.select: select cnum,cname from certiinfo where category='어학'
select * from pass_detail where cname in (select cname from certiinfo where cnum=#{cnum})
select * from( select p.*, rownum r from pass_rate_nat p where cname in (select cname from certiinfo where cnum=#{cnum})) where r between 1 and 5

select * from ( select p.*, rownum r from pass_rate p where cname in (select cname from certiinfo where cnum=#{cnum}) and (clevel in (select clevel from certiinfo where cnum=#{cnum}) or (select clevel from certiinfo where cnum=#{cnum}) is null)) where r between 1 and 5
